message.original: 狙弓の証 ハンター戦術試練
message.translation: Basic Combat Skills Tutorial of Hunter

message.original: ハンターの基本戦術を学ぶため 修練の祠にて試練に挑む
修練の祠前の崖下にいる白衛騎士団員と話す
message.translation: Talk to the White Knight near the cliff of the Training Chapel

message.original: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
message.translation: Talk to Wilson in the Training Chapel

message.original: 弓射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy with your bow and arrow

message.original: 射撃の最適距離から弓射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy at the optimum distance

message.original: 爆矢射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy with an explosive arrow

message.original: 爆矢射ちで仕込んだ矢を起爆させよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy by detonating the explosive arrow

message.original: 前蹴りで敵を攻撃せよ
message.translation: Attack the enemy by using a kick

message.original: 矢の装填を成功させよ
最深部のゴブリンを全滅せよ
message.translation: Defeat the remaining Goblins in the inner sanctum

message.original: 最奥にある＜狙弓の証＞を入手する
message.translation: Collect the Emblem proving you completed the challenge

message.original: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
